page.title: 19MOBILE SHOPS,Yeoford area.
page.content: In the Yeoford area there are seven mobile shops and services that come round the village. There is a butcher, baker, but not a candlestick maker, a postman, an ice cream van, a milkman, a dustman and a window cleaner. The butcher comes twice a week, on Saturdays and Wednesdays. The baker comes three times a week, Mondays, Wednesdays and Saturdays. The postman comes six days of the week, every day except Sunday. The ice cream van comes three times a week, Thursday nights, Saturday afternoons and Sunday nights. The milkman comes five days a week, Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Fridays and Saturdays. In the village he delivers 200 pints of milk a day. The dustman comes once a week, on Tuesdays. The window cleaner comes about twice every six months. The mobile library comes fortnightly.
